abstract.text: Creates a query for one-time access to a verifiable clinical record.

to receive all records of the specified source and record type.

This block takes the following parameters:
A reference to the query that called this block.
An array containing the verifiable health records found by the query, or
if an error occurs.

abstract.text: Access and share health and fitness data while maintaining the user’s privacy and control.
A sample that represents the contents of a SMART Health Card or EU Digital COVID Certificate.
The type of record returned by a verifiable clinical record query.
A query for one-time access to a SMART Health Card or EU Digital COVID Certificate.
Creates a query for one-time access to a SMART Health Card.
Creates a query for one-time access to a verifiable clinical record.
The source type for the verifiable clinical record.
Information about an error condition including a domain, a domain-specific error code, and application-specific information.
A definition of logical conditions for constraining a search for a fetch or for in-memory filtering.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
The return type of functions that don’t explicitly specify a return type, that is, an empty tuple `()`.
A type representing an error value that can be thrown.
